New Records: Gibraltar held Scotland to a 0-2 defeat, their first encounter in nine years, showcasing a significant achievement in defensive resilience.
Key Match Events: Scotland's inability to convert chances despite pressure; Gibraltar's defensive discipline; Christie scored Scotland's sole goal in the 57th minute; Gibraltar's emergence of young players like Hankins and Scanlon.
Pre-Game Insights: Gibraltar tested new formations with a young squad; Scotland aimed to secure a win before the Euros, starting against hosts Gibraltar.
Post-Match Reflections: Gibraltar's performance boosted confidence ahead of upcoming matches; Scotland's morale drop ahead of the Euros.
Miscellaneous Highlights: High temperatures affected play; Gibraltar's defensive discipline; Resilience in the second half despite tired legs.
